hackathon-description-text: Chrome is a sweet browser, but we think you can make it even better. Submit a new Chrome extension to the Web Store and enter our challenge for a chance to win some awesome prizes & hacker cred!
hackathon-eligibility: Anyone 13 years of age or older can participate.
hackathon-rules:
See 
Individuals 13 years of age or older can participate. This is intended as an individual effort. You can obviously get help from others, but only the submitter will be eligible for a prize.
Submissions will be scored on the following criteria:
: 4 month basic subscription to Treehouse
Awarded to the judges' top pick.
: 3 month subscriptions to Tuts+
Awarded to the judges; 2nd-5th picks.
: Featured shoutout in ChallengePost's weekly newsletter
Awarded to the submission with the most likes.
If you live somewhere where you can't take advantage of the above prizes, we'll substitute something of equivalent value.
Please see the 
 for voting rules and other terms that apply to your participation.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Featured shoutout in ChallengePost's weekly newsletter.

hackathon-description-header: Make browsing more fun with Google Chrome extensions!
